name: Deduplicate Data List
description: Removes duplicate Data objects from a list based on the 'text' column. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

data_list.name: data_list
data_list.info: List of Data objects to remove duplicates from.

code.value:
from typing import List
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.io import DataInput, Output
from axiestudio.schema import Data

class RemoveDuplicatesComponent(Component):
    display_name = "Remove Duplicates"
    description = "Removes duplicate Data objects from a list based on the 'text' column."
    icon = "filter"
    name = "RemoveDuplicates"
    inputs = [
        DataInput(
            name="data_list",
            display_name="Data List",
            info="List of Data objects to remove duplicates from.",
            is_list=True,
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Deduplicated Data List", name="deduplicated_data_list", method="remove_duplicates"),
    ]

    def remove_duplicates(self) -> List[Data]:
        data_list: List[Data] = self.data_list if isinstance(self.data_list, list) else []
        unique_data_list = []
        seen_texts = set()
        for data_item in data_list:
            if isinstance(data_item, Data) and isinstance(data_item.data, dict):
                text = data_item.data.get("text")
                if text is not None and text not in seen_texts:
                    seen_texts.add(text)
                    unique_data_list.append(data_item)

        self.status = unique_data_list # f"Removed {len(data_list) - len(unique_data_list)} duplicates"
        return unique_data_list
code.name: code

node.description: Removes duplicate Data objects from a list based on the 'text' column.

from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.io import DataInput, Output
from axiestudio.schema import Data

class RemoveDuplicatesComponent(Component):
    display_name = "Remove Duplicates"
    description = "Removes duplicate Data objects from a list based on the 'text' column."
    icon = "filter"
    name = "RemoveDuplicates"
    inputs = [
        DataInput(
            name="data_list",
            display_name="Data List",
            info="List of Data objects to remove duplicates from.",
            is_list=True,
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Deduplicated Data List", name="deduplicated_data_list", method="remove_duplicates"),
    ]

    def remove_duplicates(self) -> List[Data]:
        data_list: List[Data] = self.data_list if isinstance(self.data_list, list) else []
        unique_data_list = []
        seen_texts = set()
        for data_item in data_list:
            if isinstance(data_item, Data) and isinstance(data_item.data, dict):
                text = data_item.data.get("text")
                if text is not None and text not in seen_texts:
                    seen_texts.add(text)
                    unique_data_list.append(data_item)

        self.status = unique_data_list # f"Removed {len(data_list) - len(unique_data_list)} duplicates"
        return unique_data_list
